articles.description: Raghuram Rajan thinks the economic playbook India has been using for a decade is proving to be subpar, leaving an enormous number of people looking for jobs. “We are really underperforming, and I think we should recognise that,” says Rajan.
articles.content: Indian students stuck in war-torn Ukraine, their peril splashed on TV screens, has brought home how many young minds leave India for higher education abroad. This is not only an economic drain on Ind… [+3055 chars]
